description:
Omega Spiral UI Design System Configuration

This file defines all visual design parameters for the Omega Spiral UI:
- Colors from the Omega Spiral logo's energy streams
- Border widths for different UI emphasis levels
- Margin percentages for responsive layout
- Supported viewport sizes for different platforms
- Shader layer opacity presets

Designers can modify these values directly without touching code.

warmAmber.description: Warm Amber - Primary text and glow color. The golden-orange energy stream from the logo's warm spiral.

pureWhite.description: Pure White - Highlight and accent color. The bright center point and silver spiral threads from the logo.

neonMagenta.description: Neon Magenta - Border and glow accent. The crimson-pink energy stream from the logo's cool spiral.

deepSpace.description: Deep Space - Background color. The void between the spiraling energy streams.

darkVoid.description: Dark Void - Alternative dark background color for UI elements. Very dark blue-gray, slightly lighter than pure black.

pureBlack.description: Pure Black - The overwhelming backdrop. The darkness that tries to consume everything, spilling between the energy streams.

disabledGray.description: Disabled Gray - Used for disabled UI elements. 50% opacity gray for indicating non-interactive states.

lightThread.description: Light Thread - Golden Certainty. The warm amber-gold energy stream representing hope, conviction, and decisive action.

shadowThread.description: Shadow Thread - Violet Patience. The deep violet-purple energy stream representing wisdom, endurance, and non-intervention.

ambitionThread.description: Ambition Thread - Crimson Self. The deep red-orange energy stream representing pragmatism, self-interest, and strategic action.

phosphorGlow.description: Phosphor Glow - White with 18% opacity for phosphor glow effect. Creates the glowing energy stream effect like the logo's center burst.

scanlineOverlay.description: Scanline Overlay - White with 12% opacity for CRT scanline pattern. Adds retro horizontal lines for authentic CRT aesthetic.

glitchDistortion.description: Glitch Distortion - White with 8% opacity for glitch distortion effect. Subtle color separation and warping like spiral distortion in logo.

thin.description: Thin border width for minimal UI framing (CRT style). Used for elegant, retro displays with subtle framing. Typical use: Credits, minimal dialogs.

standard.description: Standard border width for primary UI elements. Used for main menus, quest dialogs, and core game screens. Provides strong visual presence without overwhelming content. This is the default/recommended border width.

thick.description: Thick border width for emphasis and critical UI. Used for important dialogs, warnings, and focal point screens. Creates strong visual separation and command attention.

standard.description: Standard bezel margin as a percentage of viewport width/height. All UI elements should maintain this inset from screen edges for the CRT bezel effect. Default: 5% (creates a comfortable frame around content).

minimum.description: Minimum acceptable margin percentage. UI must never have margins smaller than this.

maximum.description: Maximum acceptable margin percentage. UI must never have margins larger than this (wastes screen space).

viewportSizes.description: All supported viewport sizes for the game, organized by aspect ratio. Add new resolutions here as the game expands to new platforms.

spiralRotationSpeed.description: Spiral rotation speed in radians per second. Positive = clockwise, Negative = counter-clockwise. Default: π/4 (45 degrees per second) clockwise.

colorCycleDuration.description: Color cycle duration in seconds. How long it takes for colors to complete one full rotation around the UI border. Default: 8 seconds for smooth, meditative motion like the logo's gentle spiral.

phosphorPulseFrequency.description: Phosphor pulse frequency in Hz. How many times per second the glow intensity oscillates. Default: 0.5Hz (gentle breathing effect, 2 seconds per cycle).

phosphorPulseRange.description: Phosphor pulse intensity range. Min/Max opacity values during pulse animation. Creates breathing effect: 12% (dim) → 24% (bright) → 12% (dim).

colorTolerance.description: Acceptable color tolerance for float precision in tests. Allows ±0.01 per RGB channel due to floating-point arithmetic.

opacityTolerance.description: Acceptable opacity tolerance for shader layer tests. Allows ±0.02 alpha channel variance.
